# DotZero AI Tools

> MCP servers and skills for DotZero manufacturing execution systems (MES)

## Quick Start

1. Install: `npx @dotzero.ai/setup`
2. Restart Claude Code
3. Authenticate: `auth_login(email, password, tenant_id)`
4. Use tools: `workorder_list()`, `oee_device()`, `chart_bar()`, etc.

## Available MCP Tools (231)

### Authentication (2)
- `auth_login` - Login with email/password/tenant_id
- `auth_status` - Check authentication status

### Work Orders (7)
- `workorder_list` - List with filters (status, date range, rush)
- `workorder_get` - Get by ID/UUID
- `workorder_create` - Create new work order
- `workorder_update` - Update existing
- `workorder_delete` - Delete by UUID
- `workorder_details` - Full details with product and operations
- `workorder_count` - Get total count

### Products (6)
- `product_list` - List with filters (name, number, category)
- `product_get` - Get by UUID
- `product_create` - Create new product
- `product_update` - Update existing
- `product_details` - Full details
- `product_copy` - Copy product

### Workers (5)
- `worker_list` - List with filters
- `worker_get` - Get by UUID
- `worker_create` - Create worker
- `worker_update` - Update worker
- `worker_delete` - Delete worker

### Operation History (7)
- `operation_history_list` - List with filters
- `operation_history_get` - Get by UUID
- `operation_history_create` - Create record
- `operation_history_create_many` - Batch create
- `operation_history_delete` - Delete record
- `operation_history_by_workorder` - Get by work order
- `operation_history_timeline` - Timeline view

### Reports & Analytics (5)
- `workorder_report` - Work order report
- `report_update` - Update report
- `weekly_report` - Weekly summary
- `analytics_operations` - Operation analytics
- `analytics_workorder_report` - Work order analytics

### Routes (7)
- `route_list`, `route_get`, `route_create`, `route_update`, `route_delete`
- `route_by_product` - Routes for a product
- `route_copy` - Copy route

### Operations (5)
- `operation_list`, `operation_get`, `operation_create`, `operation_update`, `operation_delete`

### Route Operations (6)
- `route_operation_list`, `route_operation_get`, `route_operation_create`
- `route_operation_update`, `route_operation_delete`, `route_operation_by_route`

### Devices (5)
- `device_list`, `device_get`, `device_create`, `device_update`, `device_delete`

### Stations (6)
- `station_list`, `station_get`, `station_create`, `station_update`, `station_delete`
- `station_device_list`

### Quality (12)
- Defect Reasons: `defect_reason_list`, `defect_reason_create`, `defect_reason_update`, `defect_reason_delete`
- Defect Categories: `defect_reason_category_list`, `defect_reason_category_get`, `defect_reason_category_create`, `defect_reason_category_update`
- Op Product BOM: `op_product_bom_list`, `op_product_bom_create`, `op_product_bom_update`, `op_product_bom_delete`

### Abnormal (9)
- History: `abnormal_history_list`, `abnormal_history_get`, `abnormal_history_create`, `abnormal_history_update`, `abnormal_history_by_workorder`
- Config: `abnormal_category_list`, `abnormal_category_create`, `abnormal_state_list`, `abnormal_state_create`

### Warehouse & WMS (15)
- Warehouses: `warehouse_list`, `warehouse_get`, `warehouse_create`, `warehouse_update`
- Storage: `warehouse_storage_list`, `warehouse_storage_get`, `warehouse_storage_create`, `warehouse_storage_update`
- Product Storage: `product_storage_list`, `product_storage_get`, `product_storage_by_product`
- WMS: `wms_check_inventory`, `wms_query_product_storage`, `wms_query_storage_history`, `wms_minimal_stock_count`

## Work Order Status

| Value | Status |
|-------|--------|
| 1 | Not Started |
| 2 | In Progress |
| 3 | Completed |
| 4 | Incomplete |

## Environment Variables

| Variable | Required | Description |
|----------|----------|-------------|
| WORK_ORDER_API_URL | Yes | Work Order API base URL |
| USER_API_URL | No | Auth API URL (has default) |

### SPC (41 tools)
- Measure Config (9): `spc_measure_config_list`, `spc_measure_config_get`, `spc_measure_config_create`, `spc_measure_config_update`, `spc_measure_config_delete`, `spc_measure_config_attachment_add`, `spc_measure_config_attachment_delete`, `spc_measure_config_modes`, `spc_measure_config_categories`
- Measure History (11): `spc_measure_history_create`, `spc_measure_history_upsert`, `spc_measure_history_update`, `spc_measure_history_delete`, `spc_measure_history_batch_upsert`, `spc_measure_history_batch_delete`, `spc_measure_history_manufacture`, `spc_measure_history_stock`, `spc_measure_history_count`, `spc_measure_history_filter_list`, `spc_measure_history_filter_list_stock`
- Config Parent V2 (5): `spc_config_parent_get`, `spc_config_parent_create`, `spc_config_parent_update`, `spc_config_parent_attachment_add`, `spc_config_parent_attachment_delete`
- History V2 (4): `spc_history_list`, `spc_history_batch_upsert`, `spc_history_batch_by_group`, `spc_history_delete_by_group`
- Products V2 (2): `spc_product_manufacture_list`, `spc_product_stock_list`
- Instruments (5): `spc_instrument_list`, `spc_instrument_create`, `spc_instrument_update`, `spc_instrument_delete`, `spc_instrument_batch_delete`
- Rules (1): `spc_rule_list`
- Dashboard (6): `spc_dashboard_list`, `spc_dashboard_create`, `spc_dashboard_update`, `spc_dashboard_delete`, `spc_dashboard_manufacture_create`, `spc_dashboard_manufacture_update`
- Statistics (4): `spc_statistics_nelson`, `spc_statistics_capability`, `spc_statistics_capability_by_point`, `spc_statistics_calculate_result`

### Equipment (12 tools)
- Alarms (1): `equip_alarm_list`
- Idle (1): `equip_idle_list`
- Machine Status (5): `equip_machine_status_history`, `equip_machine_status_part_counts`, `equip_machine_status_part_counts_batch`, `equip_machine_status_realtime`, `equip_machine_status_realtime_batch`
- Off Time (1): `equip_off_time_list`
- State Counts (2): `equip_state_counts_factory`, `equip_state_counts_line`

### Device Topology (37 tools)
- Groups (5): `topo_group_list`, `topo_group_get`, `topo_group_create`, `topo_group_update`, `topo_group_delete`
- Factories (5): `topo_factory_list`, `topo_factory_get`, `topo_factory_create`, `topo_factory_update`, `topo_factory_delete`
- Lines (5): `topo_line_list`, `topo_line_get`, `topo_line_create`, `topo_line_update`, `topo_line_delete`
- Devices (5): `topo_device_list`, `topo_device_get`, `topo_device_create`, `topo_device_update`, `topo_device_delete`
- Plant Floors (4): `topo_plant_floor_get`, `topo_plant_floor_create`, `topo_plant_floor_update`, `topo_plant_floor_delete`
- Alarms (5): `topo_alarm_list`, `topo_alarm_get`, `topo_alarm_create`, `topo_alarm_update`, `topo_alarm_delete`
- Alarm Codes (6): `topo_alarm_code_list`, `topo_alarm_code_get`, `topo_alarm_code_create`, `topo_alarm_code_update`, `topo_alarm_code_delete`, `topo_alarm_code_batch`
- Topology (2): `topo_topology_count`, `topo_topology_all`

### OEE (20 tools)
- Availability (4): `oee_availability_device`, `oee_availability_devices`, `oee_availability_line`, `oee_availability_factory`
- Quality (4): `oee_quality_device`, `oee_quality_devices`, `oee_quality_line`, `oee_quality_factory`
- Performance (5): `oee_performance_device`, `oee_performance_devices`, `oee_performance_line`, `oee_performance_factory`, `oee_performance_device_range`
- OEE (4): `oee_device`, `oee_devices`, `oee_line`, `oee_factory`
- Status (1): `oee_device_status`
- Alarm History (1): `oee_alarm_history`

### Export (14 tools, no auth required)
- Charts (5): `chart_bar`, `chart_line`, `chart_pie`, `chart_scatter`, `chart_gauge`
- DotZero Charts (4): `chart_oee_breakdown`, `chart_control`, `chart_timeline`, `chart_multi`
- Export (2): `export_csv`, `export_xlsx`
- Smart (2): `chart_from_json`, `export_table_from_json`

## npm Packages

- `@dotzero.ai/auth-mcp` - Authentication MCP server
- `@dotzero.ai/work-order-mcp` - Work Order MCP server (98 tools)
- `@dotzero.ai/spc-mcp` - SPC MCP server (41 tools)
- `@dotzero.ai/equipment-mcp` - Equipment monitoring MCP server (12 tools)
- `@dotzero.ai/device-topology-mcp` - Device topology MCP server (37 tools)
- `@dotzero.ai/oee-mcp` - OEE MCP server (20 tools)
- `@dotzero.ai/export-mcp` - Chart & export MCP server (14 tools, no auth)
- `@dotzero.ai/dotzero-mcp` - Unified gateway MCP (6 tools + dynamic loading)
- `@dotzero.ai/setup` - One-command setup CLI

## Source

- Repository: https://github.com/dotzero-ai/dz-ai
- Website: https://dotzero.app
